channel.title: Is the lost isle using your ip?
channel.description:
If Lost Isle server are using your ip to post there server under your name you need to follow these steps
First a bit of information, how i think they do it;
They use 3 types of software
Ip Tracker Ip changer Ip mask
The ip rtacker will locate Peoples ip's who have the default username and password on there router.
The ip changer will change your ip every 1 minute so they can continue to post there server under your name
Ip mask will mask there ip so you can't find them!!
Now follow these simple steps
Go to start menu All Programs accessories command prompt
Now open command prompt up (short for cmd) and type this
ipconfig /all
Ip Adress
It will look something like this
192.168.1.1 (you last number can be from 1.1-1.5)
Now type that in your browser
You will not by prompted to enter an username and password default is
user - admin password - admin
Now, (this is with my router, might be diff with yours)
Go to security or maintence
Now put in your current password (default is admin)
and now make up ya own password! If i where you i would use letters and numbers!!
apply/save setting
Next do a ful virus scan, might need 2 restart your computer.
Hope this helped you guys out!! Johno!

item.title: Is the lost isle using your ip?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:3, topic:269570”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=355750.msg2722590#msg2722590 date=1238097076]
Umm… no. Most likely they’re just pinging your DNS and using it whenever your server goes off the list.

I really don’t think MoparScape’s server status page checks if your IP is the same as the one you put it.
[/quote]

Maybe, buts it’s worth a shot, might even make your comp more secure![/quote]

Well. I guess this is a good job. Yet the wrong section. If you are right then congrats to you and mabey pepole will set passwords on there router.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the lost isle using your ip?

item.title: Is the lost isle using your ip?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

If Lost Isle server are using your ip to post there server under your name you need to follow these steps

First a bit of information, how i think they do it;

They use 3 types of software

Ip Tracker
Ip changer
Ip mask

The ip rtacker will locate Peoples ip’s who have the default username and password on there router.

The ip changer will change your ip every 1 minute so they can continue to post there server under your name

Ip mask will mask there ip so you can’t find them!!

Now follow these simple steps

Go to start menu
All Programs
accessories
command prompt

Now open command prompt up (short for cmd)
and type this

ipconfig /all

Ip Adress

It will look something like this

192.168.1.1 (you last number can be from 1.1-1.5)

Now type that in your browser

You will not by prompted to enter an username and password
default is

user - admin
password - admin

Now, (this is with my router, might be diff with yours)

Go to security or maintence

Now put in your current password (default is admin)

and now make up ya own password! If i where you i would use letters and numbers!!

apply/save setting

Next do a ful virus scan, might need 2 restart your computer.

Hope this helped you guys out!!
Johno!
